info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:39PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Piute...north central Garfield and western Wayne Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 238 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Antimony, or 24 miles northwest of Escalante, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antimony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
